name: fraud-detection-aws-cdk
description: AWS CDK infrastructure for Real-Time Fraud Detection System

scripts.deploy: npm run build && cdk deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --all --require-approval never -c environment=dev
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && cdk deploy --all --require-approval never -c environment=staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --all --require-approval never -c environment=prod

author: Fraud Detection Team
